name: profileBuilder
description: Create your profile using your data

cozy-permissions.apps: Required by the cozy-bar to display the icons of the apps
cozy-permissions.questionnaire: Required by the profile app to generate your sushi preferences
cozy-permissions.user: Required by the profile app to display your profile
cozy-permissions.post: Required by the profile app to generate your tag preferences
cozy-permissions.prefecture: Required by the profile app to generate your sushi preferences
cozy-permissions.region: Required by the profile app to generate your sushi preferences
cozy-permissions.seta: Required by the profile app to generate your sushi preferences
cozy-permissions.setb: Required by the profile app to generate your sushi preferences
